StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRUCReserveUnits]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT rru.[RUCReserveUnitID] AS RUCReserveUnitID, ruc.RUCID AS RUCID, ruc.Descrip.on AS RUC, ru.ReserveUnitID AS ReserveUnitID, ru.Descrip.on AS ReserveUnit, msc.MSCID AS MSCID, msc.Descrip.on AS MSC, ruc.Descrip.on + ' - ' + ru.Descrip.on AS RUCReserveUnitValue FROM [dbo].[RUCReserveUnit] rru INNER JOIN [RUC] ruc ON rru.RUCID = ruc.RUCID INNER JOIN [ReserveUnit] ru ON rru.ReserveUnitID = ru.ReserveUnitID INNER JOIN [MSC] msc ON rru.MSCID = msc.MSCID ORDER BY RUCReserveUnitValue
